alert.note: Alert for Grant; Hot Spring; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 11 at 11:20PM CDT until March 12 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Grant County in central Arkansas... South central Saline County in central Arkansas... Northeastern Hot Spring County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 1100 PM CST. * At 1019 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Perla, or near Malvern, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Malvern... Sheridan... Rockport... Prattsville... Poyen... Perla... Thiel... Jenkins Ferry State Park... Dogwood... Magnet Cove... Cross Roads in Grant County... Fenter... Slabtown... Gifford... Buie... Brush Creek... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
